properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Intracoastal City to Cameron LA out 20 NM; Waters from Lower Atchafalaya River to Intracoastal City LA from 20 to 60 NM; Waters from Intracoastal City to Cameron LA from 20 to 60 NM; Coastal waters from Lower Atchafalaya River to Intracoastal City LA out 20 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 1 at 4:12AM CST until January 2 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Lake Charles LA
properties.description:
* WHAT...South winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and seas
5 to 8 feet expected.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Intracoastal City to Cameron LA
out 20 NM, Coastal waters from Lower Atchafalaya River to
Intracoastal City LA out 20 NM, Waters from Intracoastal City
to Cameron LA from 20 to 60 NM and Waters from Lower
Atchafalaya River to Intracoastal City LA from 20 to 60 NM.

* WHEN...From midnight tonight to 6 PM CST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 PM CST THURSDAY
